Title: The First Piece
Text:
Marcel's station wagon is in bad shape, but he hasn't given up on it. Neither will I. He told me there's a van near the old general store in Drabus Strip that might have a whitewall wheel just like his.

It's owned by a guy named Old Remy. Hopefully, he’s willing to part with it. Probably won’t be free though.
CompleteText: I handed Marcel the whitewall. He held it like something sacred - like a piece of his old life, not just a tire. I didn’t say anything. Didn’t need to. The way his hands shook said enough. One piece back in place.
